title: Ricardo R. Bartelme, M.D. | Family Medicine | Michigan Medicine
description: Dr. Bartelme is a graduate of the U-M Medical School and completed his family medicine residency at the University of California-San Diego, where he also served as chief resident. He has a special interest in alternative natural medicine and family-centered obstetrics. He speaks English and Spanish. He sees patients at Briarwood Family Medicine
cleaned_text: Biography Dr. Bartelme is a graduate of the U-M Medical School and completed his family medicine residency at the University of California-San Diego, where he also served as chief resident. He has a special interest in alternative natural medicine and family-centered obstetrics. He speaks English and Spanish. He sees patients at [Briarwood Family Medicine ](http://www.uofmhealth.org/our-locations/briarwood-family) Areas of Interest Complementary and alternative medicine, anthroposophic medicine. Credentials Medical School - University of Michigan Medical School, Ann Arbor, Mich., 1981 Residency - University of California San Diego Medical Center, Family Medicine, San Diego, Calif., 1984 Professional Organizations - Physician's Association for Anthroposophic Medicine - Society for Integrative Oncology Board Certification - Family Medicine Published Articles or Reviews Key Publications Bartelme RB. [Anthroposophic Medicine, an Introduction; and a Book Review
